downstreamGWAS 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    meta-analysis

    Function reference

    All functions

    call_container()
    Construct the code to call a container using a specific program
    check_setup()
    Check that the configuration file has been correctly set up
    effective_n()
    Calculate effective N
    get_system_paths()
    Read downstreamGWAS filepaths from yaml file
    irwl_ldsc()
    Run LDscore regression --h2 flag.
    ldsc_rg()
    Estimate genetic correlation between two GWAS using LDSC
    liability_scale_h2()
    Convert an estiamte of observed-scale heritability to liability scale heritability
    ls_sumstats()
    List the available sumstats
    meta_analyze()
    Perform meta-analysis of GWAS summary statistics datasets in [tidyGWAS::tidyGWAS()] hive-style format.
    meta_analyze_by_chrom()
    meta_analyze summary statistics, one chromosome at a time!
    ranges_to_bed()
    Convert clumped.ranges output from Plink to bed format
    read_gwas()
    Read in a tidyGWAS formatted summary statistics file
    read_ldsc_h2()
    read the output of LDSC --h2
    run_clumping()
    Construct genetic loci from GWAS
    run_ldsc()
    Run munge LDSC and LDSC -h2 from tidyGWAS
    run_sbayesrc()
    Run sbayerc with tidyGWAS structure
    run_sbayess()
    Run Sbayes-S with tidyGWAS structure
    run_sldsc()
    run Stratified LDscore regression on tidyGWAS formatted sumstats
    run_sldsc_cts()
    Run stratified LDscore regression using the --h2-cts flag
    sbayesrc()
    Run SbayesRC from R with containers
    setup()
    Setup required filepaths for downstreamGWAS
    tidyGWAS_paths()
    Create the folder structure and filepaths for downstreamGWAS directory
    to_ldsc()
    Export tidyGWAS format to LDSC format
    to_ma()
    Convert tidyGWAS to COJO .ma format
    to_plink_clumping()
    Convert tidyGWAS hivestyle partitioning to compatible format for plink clumping
    with_container()
    Run a command in a container
    wrapper_sbayesrc()
    Capture code to run sbayesRC

    Developed by The package maintainer.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.9.
